EmailTemplate.name: CASE: Request for Environment Access
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for environment access: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
To assist with further investigation of this case, we are requesting access to your environment via a unique login.
Please create a 'User' to allow access for us to continue with our analysis.
If you require help, view the Knowledge Article Remote Support Access for SaaS Customers in the Customer Community. This article also contains the recommendation for deactivation of the user.
For Security and Privacy purposes do not email the password to us.
When we receive an email regarding the creation of the new user, we will contact you separately regarding the password.
Please provide the following information via return email to approve TechnologyOne access to your environment:
Replying with 'Yes': means 'Our organisation gives permission for a TechnologyOne staff member to access our environment.' Username Created: (Enter username here) URL: (Please insert the URL link for the required environment)
Kind regards, TechnologyOne Support
TechnologyOne accepts no liability for this email or its attachments. It is for the intended recipient only. More info Stop_Spam@TechnologyOneCorp.com
